word: God help you to bear with the errors and mistakes of each other. . . . If a hasty word is spoken, take it [back] by confession as soon as possible, and heal the wound and keep in the sunshine and you will not only be happy yourselves, but be a blessing to others.--Letter 22, 1870, pp. 3-5. (To Edson and Emma White, December 16, 1870.)
